data.text:
@Arturstweet Hello! Thank you for the question! Please let your friend know (👀) that this depends on the governmental decisions. If there will be any changes affecting air travel, the information will be updated: https://t.co/pPFt9maukj 
Thank you!

urls.title: Travel regulations | airBaltic
urls.description: Your guide to getting the right information about travel documentation and up-to-date travel requirements.

data.text: @bymarieliis Hello! We are saddened to hear about such unpleasant situation. In order to look into this, may we kindly ask you for more details where did you noticed this - at which airport, and possibly a flight? You may also DM us these details privately if needed. Thank you.

@EJHarrison6 Hello! Thanks for your question. We kindly invite you to follow the information on the airport screens or contact the airport information desk for further details in regards to the check in desks and baggage drop options. Thank you.

@aigarzzs Labdien, Aigar! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Pirmkārt, atvainojamies par neērtībām, ar kurām Jums nācies saskarties. Lai labāk izprastu konkrēto gadījumu, aicinām iesniegt oficiālu sūdzību mūsu mājas lapā: https://t.co/KyWmFGU2Mk
Mūsu kolēģi to izmeklēs un sazināsies ar Jums. Paldies.

urls.title: Izteikt pretenziju | Sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Gadījās kaut ko aizmirst lidmašīnā? Bagāžas piegāde kavējās? Piesaki pretenziju airBaltic par bagāžas pārvadāšanu, reisa izmaiņām un daudz ko citu internetā!

data.text: We are glad to announce that during the upcoming summer season 2022, airBaltic will offer flights on a total of 92 routes from Riga, Tallinn, Vilnius and Tampere. Start planning your summer travel now: https://t.co/TdEVf4gASn https://t.co/D3hyxzANaQ

urls.title: 70+ destinations | Where we fly | airBaltic
urls.description: See the impressive list of 70+ airBaltic destinations. Consider where to fly and what you can do when you get there!

data.text: @JohnsPhotos @flightradar24 Hello! Those are our Sunday's evening regular flights coming back to Riga. :)
@Nolimmit4 Hello! No, that is our Sunday's evening schedule of regular flights coming back to Riga from destinations in Western Europe.

@LooFranklin1 Hi! Thanks for the recommendation. Currently we don't have such plans, however who knows what the future may bring.
At the moment airBaltic is performing its flights to/from London by using Gatwick Airport (LGW).
@normis Atgriežamies mājās no lielākajām Eiropas pilsētām! ☺️

@andrisblaka Labdien! Tas joprojām ir pieejams pasūtot iepriekš: https://t.co/4qzYPc93zM
Ēdienu, kā arī dzērienu karte uz klāja katru sezonu tiek atjaunota balstoties uz mūsu pasažieru pieprasītākajām precēm.

Packing for a trip can be quite stressful, but we’re here to offer two solutions! 💡 Choose additional services such as heavy cabin baggage or checked baggage and never worry about over-packing!
❗️ Till the 21st of March, add baggage to an existing booking with a 20% discount! https://t.co/TSYNw8sSrR
Has the sunshine and blooming spring inspired some travel plans? We would love to get lost in the infinite fields of tulips and take in the magic that comes with it! 😍 https://t.co/VVYh0E08vK

You could say it's in our nature to be good at landings, therefore you can trust us when we tell you we got some tips on how to land your job interview! 🛬 Learn tips and tricks from our Talent Acquisition specialist and see our latest vacancies here: https://t.co/9jU3LeIsh8 https://t.co/T0d16kirVc
@rence9 @my_rita @ilze_sedlina Labvakar! airBaltic tuvākais lidojums no Berlīnes uz Rīgu ir tikai 17. martā. Visticamāk citas (piem. kurjerpasta) opcijas būs ātrākas, kā arī pieejamākas šajā mirklī.
@RobertsAboltins Labdien! Šobrīd tiešie lidojumi šajā maršrutā tiek plānoti līdz maija sākumam, un tad tos atkal atsākam ar jūnija izskaņu.
@kogylv 💚

@Xelatyper Hello, Alex! Thanks for reaching out to us and our sincere regrets for the inconveniences experienced. We kindly invite you to check your DM's as we have provided an answer to your query there. Thank you.

Wish to travel with class - have baggage, seat reservation, no change fee and more included in the ticket? 🧳️✈️ Use the opportunity and purchase GREEN classic tickets till 17th of March with a discount! Find out more here: https://t.co/JJ1JD5lUdj https://t.co/CYqnYm0uGt

data.text: Last month 125 200 passengers in around 1920 flights chose airBaltic as a part of their journey. ✈ It's almost five times more than during the same period last year, we're happy to see you all on board! Read more here: https://t.co/CFHxlU3i90 https://t.co/A9wYz2bPWx

@Rinaldinho Labdien, Rinald! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Šādā gadījumā aicinām sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu: https://t.co/pMlqBcjXkM
Kolēģi pārbaudīs Jūsu konkrēto gadījumu un informēs par iespējām. Paldies.

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: @wazsabi Paldies par precizējumu! Šobrīd veicam padziļinātu šīs situācijas izmeklēšanu, sadarbojoties ar kolēģiem no mūsu tehniskā departamenta. Lai precīzāk varētu minēto gadījumu izskatīt, lūdzam DM atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas (e-pasta adresi, kā arī rezervācijas numuru). Paldies.
@wazsabi Labdien, Sandra! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Vai varam lūgt atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas (rezervācijas numuru), rakstot mums DM? Pārbaudīsim! Paldies!

Flexibility is travellers' new best friend! 🌍 For 19.99 EUR add flight cancellation option when purchasing the ticket and be ready for unexpected changes. Cancel up to 24 hours and receive a full refund in the form of a gift card!
Read more here: https://t.co/7W4NSOM6cI https://t.co/EjGhHxdXxC

During winter when it's cold and icy, there's only one team to call! ❄️ We caught our de-icing coordinator Dmitrijs on the ground and asked a few questions to better understand what it's like to be the go-to person during the winter season. Join the team: https://t.co/p6U30fEv8E https://t.co/1sHQ44R28f
Starting from March, non-essential travel to Latvia is allowed for everyone! ✈️ Read more detailed information here: https://t.co/KGbXuvl52W https://t.co/DlcVQhcTm3

airBaltic announces that it has made a decision to leave the Russian market until further notice and cancel all of the planned flights to and from Russian destinations. This decision follows the previous announcement of the temporary flight suspension. https://t.co/4sLAD0hx5g

airBaltic paziņo, ka pieņēmusi lēmumu līdz turpmākam paziņojumam atstāt Krievijas tirgu un atcelt visus plānotos reisus uz un no galamērķiem Krievijā. Šis lēmums seko pēc iepriekš izziņotā lidojumu apturēšanas paziņojuma. https://t.co/ykqycioCaO

@rudites Labvakar! Šī ir automatizētā reklāma, ko mājaslapā ievieto Google algoritms. Jau kopš iebrukuma sākuma esam veidojuši tā saucamās blacklistes, lai šādas reklāmas konkrētās lapās neparādās - nodosim arī šo tvītu un mājaslapas adresi kolēģiem, paldies par informēšanu.

data.text: airBaltic paziņo, ka pašreizējās situācijas dēļ tā pieņēmusi lēmumu līdz 2022. gada februāra beigām apturēt nakts lidojumus uz un no Ukrainas. Lidsabiedrība turpinās nodrošināt reisus no Kijevas gan uz Rīgu, gan Viļņu: https://t.co/0Ltz9VJSTV https://t.co/0fV6DqnrtG

airBaltic announces that due to the current situation it has made a decision to temporarily suspend overnight flights to and from Ukraine until the end of February 2022. The airline will continue to provide flights from Kyiv to both Riga and Vilnius: https://t.co/4iaGsI1d1Q https://t.co/J5NdfV7glA

We are delighted to announce that during the summer season 2022 airBaltic will offer passengers flights from Riga to Malta 🇲🇹, Yerevan (Armenia 🇦🇲) and Baku (Azerbaijan 🇦🇿). Start planning your summer vacation now: https://t.co/MFeV56GFRv https://t.co/BBHoTnkCuJ

data.text: @Jaanikatweets Good morning! We are saddened to hear about such unpleasant situation. May we kindly ask you to send us DM message with more details and case number? We will check.

@bitcoinkatia Apologies for the unpleasant situation. Please note that every situation is different, due to various factors sometimes its not possible for us to further delay the other flight. We kindly ask you to turn to our representatives if care must be provided.Thank you for understanding

@AgitasLaiks Labvakar! Atvainojamies par reisa kavēšanos slikto laikapstākļu dēļ Briselē. Situācija šī vakara laikā ir vairākkārt mainījusies, tāpat arī plānotie izlidošanas laiki par kuriem informējam visus pasažierus. Paldies par pacietību un ceram, ka varēsim būt gaisā jau pavisam drīz.

@juulijanikitina Labrīt! Lūgsim bez rupjībām, paldies!
Attiecībā par pašu jautājumu, lūdzam privāti DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par konkrēto rezervāciju - pārbaudīsim.

Do not miss out on the last bits of winter fun! ❄️ Just until February 18, book flights and bring your own skis or snowboard with a 30% discount – only for 24.49 EUR one way! 🏂⛷ Be sure to check out our skiing destinations and book now: https://t.co/pT9B7zAtyX https://t.co/uBuMmRgCSr

data.text: @we_wa_ke Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing some issues at the airport. May we ask you to clarify the situation? We kindly advise you to contact the airport staff for further assistance in regards to the baggage retrieval. Thank you.

data.text: airBaltic’s ninth #NFT collection is live! 🔔 The new edition of the City Collection features Valmiera #cryptoart and can now be purchased by #NFTCommmunity on @opensea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether: https://t.co/HjjoswvYpP https://t.co/cXuv6U4juk

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection | OpenSea
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: @JurisMillers @PTACgovLV @Talis_L Labdien vēlreiz! Meklējot telefonu izmeklējām šo lietu un visus apstākļus. Kolēģu sākotnēji sniegtā atbilde nebija precīza. Tikām informēti, ka šorīt ir saņemts arī Jūsu iesniegums, uz kuru tiks atbildēts jau tuvāko stundu laikā ar precizējumu konkrētās rezervācijas sakarā.
@JurisMillers @Talis_L @PTACgovLV Labrīt! Atvainojamies par izmaiņām lidojumu grafikā. Vai varam lūgt sīkākas detaļas, kur šāda informācija Jums tika sniegta?

@teoirbe 😭
Esam nodevuši šos tvītus mūsu sapņu autobusu departamentam.

To address the significant passenger demand for flights from Kyiv, Ukraine to Riga, Latvia, airBaltic has scheduled two additional flights on February 15 and February 16, 2022. Tickets for the flights can already be purchased on our webpage: https://t.co/caft3TcU8r https://t.co/11hJCK9qZz

Lai reaģētu uz ievērojamo pasažieru pieprasījumu, airBaltic ieplānojis divus papildu lidojumus no Kijevas, Ukrainā uz Rīgu, Latvijā šī gada 15. un 16. februārī. Biļetes šiem lidojumiem iespējams iegādāties mūsu mājaslapā: https://t.co/h0BjH7uUag https://t.co/Vqw0o1dsKC

Love comes in many different shapes and forms. But how do people at @airBaltic feel about #love? 👀 We asked them and got personal about it - watch the video to feel love in the air! Happy #ValentinesDay2022, travellers! 💖 https://t.co/Qgiu2Jebk0

data.text: @mollvsc Hello! Please DM us privately more details about your reservation (booking reference number), we will check!

@coderxin Good morning!
We kindly ask you to send us more details privately about the flights you are trying to book - passenger count, route, precise flights and times. We will check.

@sanmikela It is not possible to "calculate" lowest roundtrip prices on a month view, as the total price depends on both outbound and return dates, and these two can be on separate months as well (for example outbound February 28th, return April 4th).

@sanmikela Hello, Inaara! Calendar on the left side is showing you possible one way prices on this month, but you have chosen a roundtrip option, meaning you need to choose both outbound and return flights, and then total price of course will be higher.

@TeemuK9 Hello! We are sorry to hear about such unfortunate experience. We kindly invite you to submit us an online claim: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An
Our colleagues from Customer Relations department will investigate your particular situation further and will get in touch with you.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text: @dia797 Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. Our apologies for the inconveniences. May we kindly ask you to share your booking reference number via DM? We will check. Thank you.
@KingProbby Love it! 💚
@LeeHambley Well, maybe mixing all of these together wouldn't be the best idea, BUT at least one of them - we totally recommend!
@AnceSk https://t.co/7UGtryEz6r

@voldemarz Varam ieteikt iztīrīt interneta pārlūkprogrammas ķešatmiņu (izdzēst cookies), vai mēģināt veikt rezervāciju, izmantojot citu ierīci, vai interneta pārlūkprogrammu. Ja problēma joprojām pastāv, aicinām sazināties ar mūsu rezervāciju departamentu: https://t.co/CHGjV15S1F
Paldies.

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: @voldemarz Labvakar! Paldies par Jūsu jautājumu. Aicinām klikšķināt opciju "Turpināt". Minētais logs tiks aizvērts un Jums būs iespēja turpināt biļešu rezervēšanas procesu kā ierasts arī nepasūtot maltīti. :) Paldies.

We’re happy to be on the right path to recovery and see an increase in keen travelers! 🧳 During January 2022, airBaltic has carried 232% more passengers than during the same period last year. Totaling in over 147 000 passengers and 2480 performed flights: https://t.co/MUKP7gI8vQ https://t.co/lccbbGAOCg
@Agy_1988 Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt Jūsu rezervācijas numuru, kā arī lidojumu datus - pārbaudīsim sīkākas detaļas.

@Agy_1988 Labrīt! Ja biļetes turp-atpakaļ iegādātas vienas rezervācijas ietvaros, mums atceļot, piemēram, tikai vienu lidojumu, pasažieris naudas atmaksu var pieprasīt par abiem lidojumiem - gan turp, gan atpakaļceļu!

@dia797 Good morning! At the moment we have not received any claims from passengers that the check-in is not available - it is possible some small hiccup during the night, or individual reason. Please DM us privately more details, we will check!
@Edgars28776715 Paldies, nodevām Jūsu tvītu mūsu tehniskajai komandai. Šobrīd iesakām izmantot mūsu mājaslapu https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg no mobilās ierīces, lai veiktu lidojumu rezervāciju uz Korfu!

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @Edgars28776715 Labdien, Edgar! Vai izmantojiet airBaltic Club mobilo aplikāciju un novērojat šādu problēmu?

@phronemophobe @neadekvaata Labrīt! Redzam, ka daļa no Twitter lietotājiem jau ir nokomentējusi - standarta maksimālie reģistrētās bagāžas izmēri ir 100x50x80 cm un arī mugursomu ir iespējams tā pārvadāt. Sīkāk: https://t.co/NL8ZSVZGXA
